title: German ISIS bride sentenced to 10 years in prison over death of Yazidi girl left to die in sun
content:
1. German ISIS bride sentenced to 10 years in prison over death of Yazidi girl left to die in sun  CNN
  2. German IS woman jailed for Yazidi girl's death in Iraq  BBC News
  3. German court convicts ISIS bride for 'crimes against humanity' in death of 5-year-old Yazidi 'slave'  The Washington Post
  4. German Woman Convicted of a Crime Against Humanity in Death of Yazidi Child  The New York Times
  5. German court jails IS woman for Yazidi girl's death in Iraq  The Guardian

localize.title: ドイツのISISの花嫁、ヤジディ教徒の少女を太陽の下で放置して死なせたことで10年の懲役刑を宣告される
德国ISIS新娘因雅兹迪女孩的死亡而被判处10年有期徒刑。
德國ISIS新娘因雅茲迪女孩的死亡而被判處10年有期徒刑。
